mapper.select: select * from stadium join region_detail on sd_rd_num = rd_num join members on sd_me_id = me_id where (sd_name like concat('%',#{cri.search} ,'%') or sd_intro like concat('%',#{cri.search} ,'%')) order by sd_num desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select count(*) from stadium where (sd_name like concat('%',#{cri.search} ,'%') or sd_intro like concat('%',#{cri.search} ,'%'))
select * from stadium join region_detail on sd_rd_num = rd_num join members on sd_me_id = me_id where sd_num = #{sd_num} order by sd_num desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stadium(sd_rd_num, sd_name, sd_register_date, sd_contact, sd_me_id, sd_price, sd_intro) VALUES (#{stadium.sd_rd_num}, #{stadium.sd_name}, NOW(), #{stadium.sd_contact}, #{stadium.sd_me_id}, #{stadium.sd_price}, #{stadium.sd_intro})
